The modern cosmopolitan experience has spread rapidly within the last five years, and luxury brands such as Hi-design have now become "premium' and affordable to the upper middle class, according to Mr Dilip Kapur . "We're trying to be as transparent and as collaborative as possible," Eric Schmidt said. We try to stay well within the safety zone of the way we're operating with respect to the legal issues and the competitive issues. We also argue very strongly that the things that we're doing are very pro-competitive, and I genuinely believe that, he said. Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , will oversee strategic projects.
